duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop comprehensive educational content and materials tailored to the specific needs of home care industry customers, ensuring alignment with industry best practices.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to curate content to meet training needs and learning objectives.
Prepare and host interactive webinars, workshops, and education sessions for Franchise Networks, providing expert insights, sharing industry trends, and facilitating Q&A sessions.
Oversee Learning Management System (LMS) administration including licensing and procurement of all educational technology tools.
Monitor and report on the progress and participation of Franchise Network providers in educational programs, tracking their development and identifying areas for improvement.
Responsible for ongoing customer communication and maintaining an active list of strategic learning objectives for every customer utilizing CRM.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in education, business, healthcare or related field.
